mapper.sql: file_id, user_id, data_key, file_name, strain, size, create_date, update_date, path, state, file_format, sample, another_name, md5, batch,oss_path,upload_state
f.file_id, f.user_id, data_key, file_name, strain, size, create_date, update_date, path, state, file_format, sample, another_name, md5, batch,oss_path,upload_state
mapper.select:
select
,
,
from tb_file f left join tb_file_tag_relat filetag on f.file_id = filetag.file_id left join tb_tag tag on tag.tag_id = filetag.tag_id left join tb_app_tag_relat apptag on tag.tag_id = apptag.tag_id where f.file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
,
,
from tb_file f left join tb_file_tag_relat filetag on f.file_id = filetag.file_id left join tb_tag tag on tag.tag_id = filetag.tag_id left join tb_app_tag_relat apptag on tag.tag_id = apptag.tag_id
where data_key in (${dataKey})
mapper.insert: insert into tb_file_tag_relat (file_id,tag_id) select #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},tag_id from tb_tag where tag_name = #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_file_tag_relat where file_id=#{fileId} and tag_id=#{tagId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_file (file_id, user_id, data_key, file_name, strain, size, create_date, update_date, path, state, file_format, sample, another_name, md5, data_tags, batch,oss_path,upload_state ) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileFormat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ossPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadState,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into tb_file
file_id,
user_id,
data_key,
file_name,
strain,
size,
create_date,
update_date,
path,
state,
file_format,
sample,
another_name,
md5,
data_tags,
batch,
oss_path,
upload_state,
#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fileFormat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sample,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{dataTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ossPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tb_file
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
strain = #{strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_format = #{fileFormat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sample = #{sample,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
another_name = #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_tags = #{dataTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
oss_path = #{ossPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_state = #{uploadState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_file set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strain = #{strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_format = #{fileFormat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sample = #{sample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, another_name = #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_tags = #{dataTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oss_path = #{ossPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_state = #{uploadState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_file set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strain = #{strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_format = #{fileFormat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sample = #{sample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, another_name = #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oss_path = #{ossPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_state = #{uploadState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select date_format(create_date,#{time }) time,count(file_id) num from tb_file where user_id = #{userId } and state = #{state } group by time
select date_format(create_date,#{time }) time,sum(size) size from tb_file where user_id = #{userId } and state = #{state } group by time

select
,
, (select count(*) reportNum from tb_report r where r.period = #{period } and r.flag = #{reportType } and r.state = #{state } and r.file_id=f.file_id) reportNum, (select count(*) isRunning from tb_report r where r.period != #{period } and r.flag = #{reportType } and r.state = #{state } and r.file_id=f.file_id) isRunning ,
from tb_file f left join tb_file_tag_relat filetag on f.file_id = filetag.file_id left join tb_tag tag on tag.tag_id = filetag.tag_id left join tb_app_tag_relat apptag on tag.tag_id = apptag.tag_id where user_id = #{userId } and state = #{state } order by f.create_date desc,f.file_name asc
select count(f.file_id)as fileNum,(select count(distinct(file_id))from tb_report where user_id = f.user_id)as runFileNum from tb_file f where f.user_id = ${userId}

SELECT
FROM tb_file WHERE file_id IN( SELECT file_id FROM tb_file_project_relat WHERE project_id=#{projectId} ) ORDER BY another_name DESC

SELECT f.file_id fileId, f.user_id userId, f.data_key dataKey, f.file_name fileName, f.strain strain, f.size size, f.create_date createDate, f.update_date updateDate, f.path path, f.state state, f.file_format fileFormat, f.sample sample, f.another_name anotherName, f.md5 md5, f.batch batch, f.oss_path ossPath, f.upload_state uploadState, a.code code FROM tb_report r LEFT JOIN tb_file f ON r.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN tb_app a ON r.app_id = a.app_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY f.another_name DESC, f.file_name DESC

select left(date_add(f.create_date ,INTERVAL -weekday(f.create_date ) day),10)time,count(f.file_id)as fileNum,sum(f.size)as size from tb_file f where f.state=0 and f.user_id = ${userId} group by time order by time desc
select count(*) formatNum,file_format fileFormat from (select file_format from tb_file where file_id in (${dataIds}) group by file_format) t
select file_id from tb_report r where file_id in (${dataIds}) and app_id=#{appId} and period!=#{period} and state=#{state} group by file_id;
select sum(size) size from tb_file where file_id in (${dataIds})

select
,
,
from tb_file f left join tb_file_tag_relat filetag on f.file_id = filetag.file_id left join tb_tag tag on tag.tag_id = filetag.tag_id left join tb_app_tag_relat apptag on tag.tag_id = apptag.tag_id where f.file_id in (${dataIds})
select count(*) number from tb_report r where r.flag=#{flag} and r.state=#{state} and r.period=#{period} and r.app_id in (${appIds});
select distinct strain from tb_file where user_id=#{user_id} and strain is not null and strain !='';
mapper.update: update tb_file set strain = #{strain}, update_date = #{updateDate}, sample = #{sample}, another_name = #{anotherName}, data_tags = #{dataTags} where file_id in (${dataIds})
mapper.select: select batch from tb_file where user_id=#{userId} and state=#{state} and batch is not null and batch !='' group by batch

select distinct f.batch from (select * from tb_task where task_id in (select max(task_id) from tb_task where state=#{state} and ((user_id=#{userId} and app_id=#{appId}) or (app_id=#{appId} and sample_id in (select sample_id from tb_sample where user_id=#{userId} and state=#{state}))) group by data_key))t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key left join tb_sample s on s.sample_id=t.sample_id where f.state=#{state}

SELECT f.file_id fileId, f.user_id userId, f.data_key dataKey, f.file_name fileName, f.strain strain, f.size size, f.create_date createDate, f.update_date updateDate, f.path path, f.state state, f.file_format fileFormat, f.sample sample, f.another_name anotherName, f.md5 md5, f.batch batch, f.oss_path ossPath, f.upload_state uploadState, a.code code FROM tb_task t LEFT JOIN tb_file f ON t.data_key = f.data_key LEFT JOIN tb_app a ON t.app_id = a.app_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND period = 2 ORDER BY f.another_name DESC, f.file_name DESC
SELECT file_id fileId, `md5` `md5` FROM tb_file WHERE file_id IN( SELECT file_id FROM tb_report WHERE app_id = #{appId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND flag = 0 AND period = 3 )
SELECT fs.sample_id FROM tb_file_sample_relat fs,tb_file f WHERE fs.file_id=f.file_id and f.data_key=#{dataKey}
